org.apache.kafka.streams.state

Interface RocksDBConfigSetter


  • public interface RocksDBConfigSetter
    An interface to that allows developers to customize the RocksDB settings for a given Store. Please read the RocksDB Tuning Guide.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setConfig(java.lang.String storeName, org.rocksdb.Options options, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> configs)
      Set the rocks db options for the provided storeName.

    • Method Detail

      • setConfig

        void setConfig(java.lang.String storeName,
             org.rocksdb.Options options,
             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> configs)
        Set the rocks db options for the provided storeName.
        Parameters:
        storeName - the name of the store being configured
        options - the Rocks DB options
        configs - the configuration supplied to StreamsConfig
